com.cronos.onlinereview.phases.logging
Class LogMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.cronos.onlinereview.phases.logging.LogMessage

public class LogMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates the entry log data and generates consistent log messages.

LogMessage

public LogMessage(java.lang.Long phaseId,
                  java.lang.String operator,
                  java.lang.String message,
                  java.lang.Throwable error)
Creates a log message. Any parameter can be null.

Parameters:
phaseId - the project id to log.
operator - the operator to log.
message - a free text message.
error - an exception to append to the log message.
